mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.month AS "month", a.dunningpeoplename AS "dunningpeoplename", a.dunningperiod AS "dunningperiod", a.dunningtasknum AS "dunningtasknum", a.dunningtaskfinished AS "dunningtaskfinished", a.dunningtaskrate AS "dunningtaskrate", a.dunningtelnum AS "dunningtelnum", a.dunningsmsnum AS "dunningsmsnum", a.dunningrepaymentamount AS "dunningrepaymentamount", a.dunningpayoffamount AS "dunningpayoffamount", a.dunningpayoffcapital AS "dunningpayoffcapital", a.dunningprofitamount AS "dunningprofitamount"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_mis_dunning_task_month_report( month, dunningpeoplename, dunningperiod, dunningtasknum, dunningtaskfinished, dunningtaskrate, dunningtelnum, dunningsmsnum, dunningrepaymentamount, dunningpayoffamount, dunningpayoffcapital, dunningprofitamount ) VALUES ( #{month}, #{dunningpeoplename}, #{dunningperiod}, #{dunningtasknum}, #{dunningtaskfinished}, #{dunningtaskrate}, #{dunningtelnum}, #{dunningsmsnum}, #{dunningrepaymentamount}, #{dunningpayoffamount}, #{dunningpayoffcapital}, #{dunningprofitamount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_mis_dunning_task_month_report SET month = #{month}, dunningpeoplename = #{dunningpeoplename}, dunningperiod = #{dunningperiod}, dunningtasknum = #{dunningtasknum}, dunningtaskfinished = #{dunningtaskfinished}, dunningtaskrate = #{dunningtaskrate}, dunningtelnum = #{dunningtelnum}, dunningsmsnum = #{dunningsmsnum}, dunningrepaymentamount = #{dunningrepaymentamount}, dunningpayoffamount = #{dunningpayoffamount}, dunningpayoffcapital = #{dunningpayoffcapital}, dunningprofitamount = #{dunningprofitamount} WHERE id = #{id}
